channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Factor Meal Delivery Promo: Free $200 Withings Body-Scan Scale
item.description: Factor meal kits offer a free $200 Withings body-scanning scale after a three-week subscription. I was afraid, then maybe a little motivated?

item.title: The 10 top government, legal startups from Disrupt Startup Battlefield
item.description: Here is the full list of the government and legal Startup Battlefield 200 selectees, along with a note on what made us select them for the competition...

item.title: Fears Mount That US Federal Cybersecurity Is Stagnating—or Worse
item.description: Government staffing cuts and instability, including this year’s prolonged shutdown, could be hindering US digital defense and creating vulnerabilities...

item.title: Every fusion startup that has raised over $100M
item.description: Fusion startups have raised $7.1 billion to date, with the majority of it going to a handful of companies.

item.title: Poor Sleep Quality Accelerates Brain Aging
item.description: Research shows that people who sleep poorly tend to have brain age that is older than their actual age. Chronic inflammation in the body caused by poo...

item.title: AI-Powered Dating Is All Hype. IRL Cruising Is the Future
item.description: Dating apps and AI companies have been touting bot wingmen for months. But the future might just be good old-fashioned meet-cutes.

item.title: The Best Over-the-Counter Sleep Aids (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: I tested an array of alternative sleep aids, from gummies to wearable patches, to see if they would help my chronic insomnia.

item.title: Tade Oyerinde and Teddy Solomon talk about building engaged audiences at TechCrunch Disrupt
item.description: Founders Tade Oyerinde and Teddy Solomon spoke at Disrupt this year about keeping communities engaged.

item.title: Investors predict AI is coming for labor in 2026
item.description: The exact impact AI will have on the enterprise labor market is unclear but investors predict trends will start to emerge in 2026.

item.title: These are the best gadgets for your pet right now
item.description: From AI smart cameras that describe your pet's actions to a smart door that knows when they want to go outside, these are the best pet gadgets of 2025...
